featured.text: Though the family knows she cannot be killed, they worry that their secret will be revealed when they try to kill her.
A newly published study, however, revealed that rising temperatures are posing an 27 threat to the last tropical glaciers in Indonesia’s Papua region.
He revealed his rival’s blood type.
Studies reveal that negative emotions are seated in an area of the brain called the amygdala.
One former prime minister considered it important enough to reveal in his official profile that he was a type A, while his opposition rival was type B.

definition.zh_def: 揭示，顯示或使某事物變得明顯。
definition.en_def: To make something known or visible that was previously hidden or unknown.
definition.example: The investigation will reveal the truth about what happened.
